original_title: Operation ‘Yukthiya’: Drugs worth over Rs. 850 mn seized in 14 days
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Police together with the Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested over 20,000 suspects over drugs-related crimes during the past 14 days of the ‘Yukthiya’ operation, says the Public Security Ministry.

Financial asset investigations have been initiated against 189 suspects and 1,298 individuals have been sent for rehabilitation. Additionally, detention orders were secured against 1,018 suspects, according to the ministry.
In addition, the Illegal Assets and Properties Investigation Division of the police have confiscated assets worth Rs. 558.5 million belonging to notorious criminal figures and drug traffickers.
Meanwhile, the Public Security Ministry also said the total estimated street value of the drugs seized during this period is Rs. 858 million.
